explains: v. 具体表现，体现；收录，包括；<古>（尤指为军事目的）组织

sentences.en: As a ballerina, to embody the duality of the Swan Queen and the black swan can be a fiendishly difficult task.
sentences.cn: 作为一名芭蕾舞女演员，体现天鹅女王和黑天鹅的二元性可能是一项极其困难的任务。

sentences.en: British cars, once memorably described as a skip on wheels, have come to embody the national humiliation of that benighted era.
sentences.cn: 英国汽车在记忆中一度被称为车轮上的跳板，如今已成为那个愚昧时代的国耻象征。

sentences.en: When public opinion is particularly polarised, as it was following the end of the Franco regime, monarchs can rise above "mere" politics and "embody" a spirit of national unity.
sentences.cn: 当公众舆论两极分化时，就像佛朗哥政权结束后那样，君主可以超越“纯粹的”政治，成为国家统一的精神“象征”。
